q: Steve Ballmer and Stephen Elop noted that the partnership will yield some enterprise friendly developments. At the press conference, Stephen Elop outlined how the Microsoft partnership is good for Nokia. Then Stephen Elop delivered the understatement of 2011. We believe this partnership is also good for Microsoft. Let's assume that over the next three years Nokia's Symbian operating system largely gets replaced by Windows Phone 7.
